name: Underlabs Inc.
tagline: We Develop iPhone & Android Apps & CMSes
description:
Lead by engineers and managed by creative directors, Underlabs is currently the leader in Mobile development, Cloud Services and Content Management systems in Canada.
Development for mobile is for iOS (iPhone, iPad and iTouch), as well as Android and Windows Phones. All developments are engineered and crafted natively for their respected platforms.
CMSes (Content Management Systems) are usually desktop Applications (for Windows, Mac and Linux) and are developed in order to curate and manage all mobile content, and users in Real Time.
Cloud servers are stored and scaled with Amazon's E3 and Amazon's EC2 for the most robust platform possible we know of.
READ MORE...
